org.springframework.integration.dsl.file

Class RemoteFileOutboundGatewaySpec<F,S extends RemoteFileOutboundGatewaySpec<F,S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.IntegrationComponentSpec<S,H>
      • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.MessageHandlerSpec<S,org.springframework.integration.file.remote.gateway.AbstractRemoteFileOutboundGateway<F>>
        • org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.RemoteFileOutboundGatewaySpec<F,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    F - the target file type.
    S - the target RemoteFileOutboundGatewaySpec implementation type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<org.springframework.integration.file.remote.gateway.AbstractRemoteFileOutboundGateway<F>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FtpOutboundGatewaySpec, SftpOutboundGatewaySpec

    public abstract class RemoteFileOutboundGatewaySpec<F,S extends RemoteFileOutboundGatewaySpec<F,S>>
extends MessageHandlerSpec<S,org.springframework.integration.file.remote.gateway.AbstractRemoteFileOutboundGateway<F>>
